AT.name: Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
AT.description: In Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney für die Nintendo 3DS-Familie machen der Rätsel-Professor und der begnadete Rechtsanwalt gemeinsame Sache. Deine Aufgabe ist es, in typischer Professor Layton-Manier Denksportaufgaben zu meistern und mit Phoenix Wright dem Richter Beweise vorzulegen, um einen schwierigen Fall zu knacken.

movies.name: Professor Layton™ vs. Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™: Teaser 2
Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Teaser
Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
AU.description: The puzzle professor and the ace attorney unite in Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, only on Nintendo 3DS! Solve puzzles to investigate as Professor Layton, present evidence to the judge as Phoenix Wright, and crack the ultimate case!

movies.name: Professor Layton™ vs. Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™: Teaser Trailer 2
Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Teaser Trailer

BG.name: Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
BG.description: The puzzle professor and the ace attorney unite in Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, only on Nintendo 3DS! Solve puzzles to investigate as Professor Layton, present evidence to the judge as Phoenix Wright, and crack the ultimate case!

BE.name: Professeur Layton vs Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
BE.description: Le maître des énigmes et le ténor du barreau unissent leurs talents dans Professeur Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, exclusivement sur Nintendo 3DS ! Résolvez des énigmes avec le Professeur Layton et présentez des preuves au juge avec Phoenix Wright pour venir à bout de l'affaire ultime !

NL.name: Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
NL.description: De professor en de advocaat slaan de handen ineen in Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, alleen voor de Nintendo 3DS! Los puzzels op tijdens professor Laytons onderzoek, presenteer je bewijs aan de rechter als Phoenix Wright en los de zaak op!

PT.name: Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
PT.description: O famoso entusiasta dos quebra-cabeças Professor Layton junta-se ao astuto advogado de defesa Phoenix Wright numa nova aventura de investigação para a Nintendo 3DS. Desvenda o caso em Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney!

movies.name: Professor Layton™ vs. Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™: Teaser Trailer 2
Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Teaser Trailer
Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Знаменитый детектив и лучший адвокат объединят усилия в игре Professor Layton vs. Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, только на Nintendo 3DS! Решайте головоломки профессором Лейтоном и выступайте в суде Фениксом Райтом, чтобы раскрыть это сложнейшее дело!
